title: Ventamatic VX2515SOLUPS Solar Gable Attic Ventilator with 12.6-Watt 18-Volt DC Motor and 12.6-Watt Panel
features: Up to 1000 CFM with additional solar panel
No wiring to AC main power source
description: The Ventamatic Solar Powered Gable Ventilator with 12.6 watt 18 volt DC Motor has no energy costs. It comes with a steel flange and steel dome. It has a 12.6 watt multi-Crystal panel. It can handle up to 1,000 CFM with additional solal panel. It is designed for attics up to 1,500 square feet. There is no wiring to the AC main power source. Ventamatic has provided the ventilation industry with an air of excellence for over 60 years. The factory is 100% powered by wind generated power, 95% of all waste products are recycled and the packaging is recycled cardboard.
